word_mean: 叶黄素：植物内的一种黄色物质，系氧合类胡萝卜素群中的物质之一，例如在绿色叶、草和其他植物物质中与胡萝卜素共存的3，3-二羟α胡萝卜素，C40H56O2

sentence.Network_en: Still others have searched the world over for berries, flowers or leaves of high xanthophyll content.

sentence.Network_en: Xanthophyll from the marigold flower is a potent antioxidant.

sentence.Network_en: The colorants of green plants consist of chlorophyll, xanthophyll and carotene.
